ygData.subject: Now about 1hs vs 2hs Re: Rangers and warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: In beta I made the same mistake, then when I hit 18th a friend of mine gave me a BBC, it took about 6 levels, but I finally got my 2h skill up.  So yes, I d
ygData.messageBody:
In beta I made the same mistake, then when I hit 18th a friend of mine gave me a BBC, it took about 6 levels, but I finally got my 2h skill up. So yes, I'd continue to work on your 2h skill, the sooner you start the better. And yes, you will have a hard time raising it, BUT as long as you are in a good party you'll be ok, if in a small party or solo you probabaly want to stick with what you are good at.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

>>> "Tom Swift" <tswift@...> 5.24.99 2:20:24 PM >>>
From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>
I am interested to hear others opinions on this. And what do you think of
trying to get my 2hs skill of 14 up to 80 on my 15th level DE warrior?
Worth working on? Or will I have a hard time increasing skill?
